DOC.brief_title: IN2SHAPE : A Study Physical Activity Depressive Symptoms Adolescence
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective project establish whether increase physical activity promote mental well-being adolescent already display depressive symptom . A objective evaluate feasibility novel self-motivated physical activity intervention , design project . The final objective project investigate alternative intervention delivery mode , adolescent sample subclinical depressive symptomatology , i.e. , present depression symptom level major depressive disorder would diagnose . We aim compare effect completely mediate delivery approach physical activity ( i.e. , researcher contact ) mediate intervention face-to-face contact fortnightly check-in telephone call .
DOC.criteria: Adolescents Grades 710 ( high school ) parents/guardians . Adolescents score middle range ( 1430 ) Centre Epidemiological StudiesDepression Scale ( possible range 060 ) . Adolescents currently engage 60+ minute physical activity per day . Adolescents experience psychosis , schizophrenia bipolar disorder . Adolescents score > 30 CESD ( indicator severe depression ) . Adolescents physical health problem condition preclude participation regular physical activity . Lack write consent adolescent and/or parent guardian .
